messages.title: PROTECTING GREEN SPACES
messages.content: Angela has been speaking to local residents concerned about the threat to local green fields and is working to find a way so that the community knows they have lost this precious land.

messages.title: ACTION ON ANTI-SOCIAL BEHAVIOUR
messages.content: A recent community meeting was called where constituents raised the issue with Angela.

messages.title: SUPPORTING LOCAL BUSINESSES
messages.content: Angela has consistently backed steps to support small businesses, which are vital to the future of our towns and suburbs and will stand against any Government policies that risk mismanagement of the economy.

messages.title: SAVE OUR PUBS
messages.content: Too many of our local pubs are closing down. Angela feels strongly this is a community loss. She supports CAMRA's aim to promote and protect our precious local pubs. Angela believes the local pub is vital to our way of life.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Working to ensure that the community is aware of any loss of local green spaces and is dedicated to protecting them.
Consistently backing measures to support small businesses and opposing government mismanagement of the economy.
Supports the aim to promote and protect local pubs, considering them vital to community life.

housing.content: Angela has been speaking to local residents concerned about the threat to local green fields and is working to find a way so that the community knows they have lost this precious land.

leaflet.personalStatement: Over the past year, Angela has been speaking to people all over Cardiff West. Through her involvement in local campaigns, Angela has shown that she is committed to helping people locally and will build upon this as your MP.

images.caption: WORKING FOR YOU IN CARDIFF WEST
